DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe , Oceania , United States America ( USA ) . The aim clinical trial compare NN5401 ( insulin degludec/insulin aspart ( IDegAsp ) ) insulin detemir ( IDet ) plus insulin aspart patient type 1 diabetes ( main period ) follow extension period compare long-term safety NN5401 plus insulin aspart insulin detemir plus insulin aspart . The main period register internally Novo Nordisk NN5401-3594 extension period register NN5401-3645 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison NN5401 Plus Insulin Aspart With Insulin Detemir Plus Insulin Aspart Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: FOR THE MAIN TRIAL , NN54013594 : Type 1 diabetes mellitus least 12 month Ongoing daily treatment insulin ( basal bolus regimen , premix insulin regimen , self mix regimen ) least 12 month HbA1c 7.010.0 % ( inclusive ) BMI ( Body Mass Index ) equal 35.0 kg/m^2 FOR THE EXTENSION TRIAL , NN54013645 : The subject must complete sixmonth treatment period trial NN54013594 FOR THE MAIN TRIAL , NN54013594 : Treatment insulin regimens insulin basal bolus regimen/premix insulin regimen/self mix regimen within 3 month Cardiovascular disease within last 6 month Uncontrolled treated/untreated severe hypertension Pregnancy , breastfeeding , intention become pregnant use adequate contraceptive measure accord local requirement Cancer medical history cancer FOR THE EXTENSION TRIAL , NN54013645 : Anticipated significant lifestyle change trial Pregnancy , breastfeeding , intention become pregnant use adequate contraceptive measure
